thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 19 of 288
thread.title: Jennie

author: Jennie
title: Jennie
text: I've used both Blue Apron and Hello Fresh. I prefer Hello Fresh because for me the preparation is a bit less involved (not so many dirty dishes!!) while the recipes are still creative and varied. It's easy, straightforward preparation and often I find I can get more than 2 servings from one "meal for two". For the price, it's a great value for me and saves me from wasting food that I buy but then end up not preparing. I look forward to my weekly deliveries!
